description.narrative: By end 2015, the Government increasingly provides resources for the setup of community based child protection services, which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Data And Child Protection, Human Rights Institutions, Justice For Children, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The social sector system reduces disparities in access to quality social services for girls and boys
